scripts.bindings:amm: soroban contract bindings typescript --network testnet --contract-id $(cat data/amm-deploy-out) --output-dir node_modules/liquidity-pool
scripts.bindings:asset_a: soroban contract bindings typescript --network testnet --contract-id $(cat data/asset-a-deploy-out) --output-dir node_modules/token-a
scripts.bindings:asset_b: soroban contract bindings typescript --network testnet --contract-id $(cat data/asset-b-deploy-out) --output-dir node_modules/token-b
scripts.postinstall: npm run bindings:amm && npm run bindings:asset_a && npm run bindings:asset_b
